author: Leslie Brody
title: At Success Academy Charter School, Stretching Comes With Growing Pains
text:
When Eva Moskowitz started her charter elementary schools in New York City more than a decade ago, she didn’t envision having high schools. But after seeing what she thought were too few good options for her young students as they grew up, she decided to start some.
It hasn’t been easy.
Her first high school, housed on two floors of a building...
